description: Put your slow cooker to work and whip up this delicious lemon chicken recipe in 4 easy steps. Mash and steamed greens make it a meal to remember.
name: Slow Cooker Lemon Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g skinless chicken thigh cutlets, fat trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, herb mix, garlic and oil in a medium bowl. Season. Turn to coat.
Heat a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 3 minutes on each side or until browned. Transfer to a 5.5L slow cooker.

Add zest, lemon juice, stock cubes and 1/2 cup cold water to slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours or until chicken is cooked through. Skim off excess fat. Whisk cream and cornflour together in a small bowl. Add to slow cooker and cook, covered, for 1 hour or until sauce has thickened slightly.
Cook broccoli and beans in a medium saucepan of boiling water for 2 minutes or until tender. Drain. Serve chicken and sauce with vegetables and mashed potato seasoned with pepper.
